title: Artistic Duplex with Lush Garden Refuge by the Kazimierz Dolny Rynek
description: Tucked among the exquisite greenery of Kazimierz Dolny’s historical core, this stunning 3-bedroom duplex harmonizes modern comforts and rustic charm across 128 sqm of beautifully designed living space. Walk into sun-bathed interiors finished with natural materials, artistic flourishes, and clever custom storage. Double-glazed doors open onto manicured gardens, and clever eco-features such as a rainwater collection system add sustainable elegance to your outdoor retreat. The upstairs loft welcomes relaxation or creative work, seamlessly connecting private life and new adventures.
neighborhood_description: Rynek, the heart of Kazimierz Dolny, offers vibrant café culture amidst a setting steeped in artistic tradition. This peaceful enclave prizes scenic green spaces, making it perfect for outdoor pursuits like cycling and riverside walks. With easy highway access, you are perfectly positioned for weekend getaways or quick commutes to larger cities.
lifestyle_benefits: serene, artistic atmosphere steps from cafés and galleries
abundance of bike and walking paths
lifestyle balanced between tranquillity and adventure
green, energizing backdrop for creativity and work-from-home
quick reach to expressways and city connections
target_buyer: Ideal for international expats, artists, and remote professionals seeking a green refuge in Poland's vibrant cultural hub, while maintaining easy travel links to urban centers.
market_positioning: With its blend of sustainable living and storybook surrounds in one of Poland's top heritage towns, this property sits firmly in the premium expat enclave segment—a unique opportunity in the local market rarely matched by modernized, garden-rich homes in Kazimierz Dolny’s historic Rynek.
